data.comment: The match has started at Roazhon Park.
Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 2, Play has been interrupted briefly in Rennes to check on Adrien Hunou, who is grimacing with pain.
Johann Hamel signals a Rennes throw-in in Lens's half.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Lens at Roazhon Park.
Adrien Hunou is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 7, Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lens's half?
Rennes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Rennes close to the penalty box.
Johann Hamel awards Lens a goal kick.
Throw-in Lens.
In the minute 9, Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Rennes, close to Lens's area.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lens.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rennes's Romain Del Castillo is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Rennes.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
In the minute 19, In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lens's Jonathan Gradit has been booked in Rennes.
Rennes are coming forward and Benjamin Bourigeaud gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Lens at Roazhon Park.
Rennes needs to be cautious. Lens have an attacking throw-in.
Rennes's Flavien Tait gets in a shot on goal at Roazhon Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Rennes in the half of Lens.
Throw-in high up the field for Rennes in Rennes.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Goal! Arnaud Kalimuendo gives Lens a 0-1 lead in Rennes.
Gael Kakuta instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 31, Rennes push forward at Roazhon Park and Flavien Tait gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lens defence.
Hamari Traore of Rennes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Lens have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Rennes to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Rennes, close to Lens's area.
Throw-in for Rennes close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Rennes.

Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Lens.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 42, Loic Bade (Lens) has received a first yellow card.
Yannick Cahuzac (Lens) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 43, Lens have a dangerous throw-in.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Rennes.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Lens at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Rennes.
The home team have replaced Adrien Truffert with Faitout Maouassa. This is the first substitution made today by Julien Stephan.
In the minute 46, Mbaye Niang is replacing Adrien Hunou for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Julien Stephan is making the team's third substitution at Roazhon Park with Eduardo Camavinga replacing Gerzino Nyamsi.
Julien Stephan (Rennes) is making a fourth substitution, with Jeremy Doku replacing Romain Del Castillo.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Rennes in the half of Lens.
Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lens's half?
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lens.

In the minute 53, Free kick Rennes.
Lens are caught offside.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 56, Lens have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Arnaud Kalimuendo for Lens drives towards goal at Roazhon Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 58, Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.

A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.

In the minute 69, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
The home team have replaced James Lea Siliki with Yann Gboho. This is the fifth substitution made today by Julien Stephan.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Tony Mauricio is replacing Gael Kakuta for the away team.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a second substitution, with Ignatius Kpene Ganago replacing Arnaud Kalimuendo.
In the minute 73, In Rennes, Mbaye Niang of Rennes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 74, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for Rennes, close to Lens's area.
Mbaye Niang gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rennes.
In the minute 75, Rennes have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Lens at Roazhon Park.
Rennes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Lens have a goal kick.
Can Rennes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Rennes Rennes drive forward through Faitout Maouassa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Rennes.
Goal! Lens extend their lead to 0-2 through Ignatius Kpene Ganago.
Seko Fofana with an assist there.
In the minute 79, Clement Michelin is replacing Jonathan Clauss for Lens at Roazhon Park.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.

Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lens's half?
Free kick for Lens in the half of Rennes.
In the minute 87, At Roazhon Park, Steven Nzonzi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Lens's Tony Mauricio misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago for Lens drives towards goal at Roazhon Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Lens's Tony Mauricio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Rennes have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
